headline: NRG Energy Announces Leadership Succession Plan
summary: HOUSTON, January 07, 2026--NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE: NRG) today announced that its Board of Directors has appointed Robert J. Gaudette, Executive Vice President, President of NRG Business and Wholesale Operations, as Chief Executive Officer, effective April 30, 2026, the date of the Company’s 2026 Annual Meeting of Stockholders.
